name: Two Halves of me Prototype
description:
This was a video game prototype created for a class about video game design basics.

it was built using Unity and the PlayMaker plug in.

The idea was a simple platformer but with two characters the user can simultaneously control and with different abilities.

Controls

For the Blue Capsule you use WASD to move and jump and E to interact with levers.

For the Blue Square you use the arrow keys to move and jump

You press q to swap which of the two characters the camera is focused on
